author: norman
msg: Commit some proof of concept to use hooks to execute fastfail stuff. This will make it more easy to to develop such plugins. The idea is related to qpsmtpd (http://wiki.qpsmtpd.org/plugin_hooks).

author: ddewolf
msg: WW-1575 Allowing Result parameters to be set on auto config actions

author: dnaber
msg: ingore case in the names of commands (Search == search etc.)

author: cdoremus
msg: Uncomment SingleSignOn Valve in server.xml so that Tomcat manager can be used without additional login. Also allows the same for included servlets in portlets.
